mapper.select:
select
from examination_question
order by ${sortField} ${sortOrder}
order by examination_question_examination_id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into examination_question
examination_question_id,
examination_question_examination_id,
examination_question_headline_id,
examination_question_question_id,

#{examinationQuestionExaminationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update examination_question
examination_question_examination_id = #{examinationQuestionExaminationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examination_question_headline_id = #{examinationQuestionHeadlineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examination_question_question_id = #{examinationQuestionQuestionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where examination_question_id = #{examinationQuestionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update examination_question set examination_question_examination_id = #{examinationQuestionExaminationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, examination_question_headline_id = #{examinationQuestionHeadlineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, examination_question_question_id = #{examinationQuestionQuestionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where examination_question_id = #{examinationQuestionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
